name: Pavanovia: Chapter One - DEMO 2.0
description: In the peaceful kingdom of Pavanovia, "The Hidden One", along with his minions, planned to conquer the kingdom using a deadly ancient weapon known as "the Orb of Aivap." It is up to Akari, a young girl from Pavillion Town and her allies to obtain six crystals of goddess Pavia, in an attempt to reveal the true identity of The Hidden One and save the kingdom. Will Akari and her friends succeed? Join the quest and defeat the dark force now!
